DOC.brief_summary: To determine effectiveness combine different concentration hydrogen peroxide carbamide use tooth bleaching .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Dental Bleaching Techniques , Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: 120 patiens 18 year old . Design : Hydrogen peroxide ( HP ) Carbamide Peroxide ( CP ) Group 1 : CP 10 % + HP 40 % Group 2 : CP 15 % + HP 40 % Group 3 : CP 20 % + HP 40 % Group 4 : HP 10 % + HP 40 %
DOC.criteria: 18 45 year old Student , teacher administrative personnel UNIBE . Dental Hypersensitivity Periodontal disease Active caries lesion Allergy latex Orthodontic treatment
